sense.name: make a causal or logical connection; group together
sense.examples: The Egyptians associated the star with Ma'at, sister of Isis, the Vulture. Uterine fibroids are not cancerous, nor do most doctors associate them with cancer. Have students write a short paragraph outlining the word or expression they associated with BEER.

sense.name: interact with
sense.examples: He associates with strange people. The churches associated to fight their dissolution. Menin associates with FANCD2, a protein involved in repair of DNA damage. People were refreshed when they associated with Jesus. I made a point of tagging along with my parents when they associated with other adults.
